message: Let's make a deal, Bob. I take $60, you take $40. It's a fair offer considering the time pressure.
I think this is a fairer split considering the value of the money will decrease each round. Let's get this done.
Bob, time is ticking and the value is decreasing. I'll take $55, you take $45. Let's settle this now and both get something.
Alice, we're losing money with every round. This is the best deal we can get now, before the inflation hurts us too much. Accept this and we can move on.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's split it down the middle and call it a day. 50/50, take it or leave it.
